Term.Name: CO-PRODUCTION
Term.Definition: A joint production venture of several organisations with agreement in advance. Participation may include co-financing, provision of production resources and/or editorial content.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: EXCHANGE
Term.Definition: A production exchanged either live, deferred or in material form between broadcasting organisations (bi- and multilateral exchanges, Eurovision etc.).
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: PURCHASE
Term.Definition: A production made by an external service on its own initiative and for which the broadcasting organisation buys only the right for one or more broadcasts (including the purchase of broadcasting rights before the production, and including cinema films).
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: OWN PRODUCTION
Term.Definition: A production, carried out on the organisation initiative, produced by its own services and under its editorial responsibility: in general with its own production facilities; or with rented external facilities; or by a production company incorporated under a legislative act or regulation - operating production facilities which are usually owned by a broadcasting organisation; or by a subsidiary of the broadcasting organisation in which it holds a controlling interest.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML
